name: Phastos Automate
description: Automating your Codebase from VS Code

phastos-automate.autoRunAll.title: Automatically Trigger all Workspace automations.
phastos-automate.autoRunAll.description: Enable this extension to run automatically when you open this workspace

phastos-automate.autoRunWorkspaceAppsOnL.title: Launch peripheral apps on launch
phastos-automate.autoRunWorkspaceAppsOnL.description: Automatically launch apps when workspace opens

phastos-automate.autoRunTerminalsOnLaunc.title: Run terminal specific workspaces
phastos-automate.autoRunTerminalsOnLaunc.description: Automatically launch terminal with provided context workspace opens

phastos-automate.autoRunBrowsersOnLaunch.title: Run terminal specific workspaces
phastos-automate.autoRunBrowsersOnLaunch.description: Automatically launch chromium based browser when workspace opens

phastos-automate.workspaceApps.title: Workspace Apps
phastos-automate.workspaceApps.description: Open workspace specific apps that you need - such as pgAdmin4, Postgres, DBeaver, Spotify

phastos-automate.browserConfig.title: Browser Config
phastos-automate.browserConfig.description: Automate opening your favorite browser or populate its tabs. Currently supporting Safari, Google Chrome, Brave Browser and Arc with spaces

useNewTabOrSplit.title: Should open multiple terminal windows or split inside one window.
useNewTabOrSplit.description: If using macos default terminal please avoid focusing away from window as terminal opens if split is true, otherwise, split won't work properly.

terminal.title: Choose between integrated or external terminal (Iterm, default mac terminal)

phastos-automate.terminalConfig.title: Terminal Config
phastos-automate.terminalConfig.description: Configuration for commands and filepaths for opening terminal or Iterm2 outside of VS Code

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
